pullRequest.body:
From LeanAPAP


---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: :v: YaelDillies can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).
This PR was included in a batch that successfully built, but then failed to merge into master (it was a non-fast-forward update). It will be automatically retried.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9055036934/job/24875560227)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9055036934/job/24875560321)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9055036934/job/24875560417)
This issue is closed, there is no need for this workaround.

Do you think these should just be public (after checking they end up in the right namespace)?

bors d+

My stance on whether one sided implications of unconditional iff lemmas without potential for dot notation should exist is "not really".

Btw the reason I added the `NNRat` namespace, as opposed to the
```
open Rat

private alias ⟨_, num_pos_of_pos⟩ := num_pos
private alias ⟨_, num_ne_zero_of_ne_zero⟩ := num_ne_zero
```
just below, is that both pairs of aliases name-conflict! The lemmas aren't autogenerated to guarantee uniqueness.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: Positivity extension for `NNRat.num`/`NNRat.den`
